results.text: You make a boast that’s too incredulous, even for you. For the next 24 hours any creature who heard your claim has an expertise die to checks made to see if you are telling the truth.
You attempt to throw your voice to make it seem like you’re somewhere else, but it doesn’t take. Creatures who investigate have advantage on any checks made to find you.
You are infuriatingly earnest. You accidentally let a crucial piece of information slip in the process of trying to lie.
Your attempt to lie is thinly-veiled and the target is on to you. You have disadvantage on your next Deception check against the target creature.
You try to put on a convincing performance to make the target think you’re enjoying this conversation, but your face gives everything away. The target’s attitude towards you decreases one step.
Telling this lie grated against something deep within you. You gain a level of Strife.
